Package managerpro.Controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    The Controller class is the main controller of the main user interface.
    CreateUserController
    This is a Controller class for the create user -view.
    KitchenController
    A Controller class to control the Kitchen -tab in the JavaFX User interface.
    LoginController
    This is the Controller class for login-view.
    MainInformationController
    MainInformationController class is handles the events and data related to the main information panel.
    PortionsController
    Controller class for the Portions tab of the user interface.
    ReservationListController
    ReservationListController class handles the data and events related to the reservation list view.
    TableInformationController
    TableInformationController handles all the data and events related to table information panel.
    WaiterController
    Controller class for the Waiter view.
